projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.subtitle: Modern React e-commerce solution with advanced filtering and checkout
projects.overview: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with React and TypeScript, featuring advanced product filtering, secure checkout process, and responsive design. The platform handles thousands of products with optimized performance and accessibility.
projects.problem: The existing e-commerce solution was slow, inaccessible, and difficult to maintain. Users struggled to find products due to poor filtering options, and the checkout process had a high abandonment rate.
projects.research: Conducted user interviews with 20+ customers to understand pain points. Analyzed analytics data to identify drop-off points. Created user personas and journey maps to guide design decisions.

design.description: Designed a clean, modern interface with focus on usability and accessibility. Created a comprehensive design system with reusable components.

build.description: Built with React 18, TypeScript, and Next.js for optimal performance. Implemented custom hooks for state management and used React Query for data fetching.

projects.title: Design System
projects.subtitle: Comprehensive design system for consistent UI across products
projects.overview: A comprehensive design system built for consistency across multiple products. Includes 50+ reusable components, design tokens, and comprehensive documentation.
projects.problem: Multiple products had inconsistent UI patterns, leading to poor user experience and increased development time. Designers and developers needed a single source of truth for UI components.
goals: Create consistent UI across all products
projects.research: Audited existing components across 5 products to identify common patterns. Interviewed 15+ developers and designers to understand their needs and pain points.

design.description: Created a cohesive design language with clear hierarchy, consistent spacing, and accessible color palettes. All components follow atomic design principles.

build.description: Built with React and TypeScript for type safety. Used CSS-in-JS for theming and Storybook for documentation and testing.
